author: P2-Tracker-BES-SW
body:
#### PR description:

Main code unpacking OT FEDRawData is EventFilter/Phase2TrackerRawToDigi/plugins/RawToClusterProducer.cc.
Two classes to store tracker header and channel offsets are also included.

Adding also an EDAnalyzer to create ntuples containing cluster properties, in order to validate re-digi clusters with original ones.

There are still many commented out couts that will be deleted once we move from draft to official PR.
#### PR validation:

Re-digi vs original clusters are available [here](https://fiorendi.web.cern.ch/ot_unpacker/new_unpacker/validation_allDTCs/), there are still some differences from clusters with large radius ( > 80 cm), which are being checked (NB: comparison is done for clusters with size <=8).
title: Unpacker rebase on pr3
